lender.name: Lalarukh
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone's life. I like the concept of microfinance and Kiva, because of the transparency of it, you can actually SEE where your money is going, that to me feels really rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I am a phd student studying cancer biology.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: supporting small business is one of the most important things we can do for each other, and for this planet.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I believe in acts of kindness.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help make a difference at the local level instead of hoping my tax dollars actually help someone in a less developed country through government aid programs.
lender.occupational_info: I inspect facilities that produce pollutants to make sure such businesses are not polluting the air we breathe more than allowed by law.

lender.name: Krysti
lender.loan_because: I loan to Kiva because I support women entrepreneurs in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I work on power plants.

lender.name: DWFraserWinsby
lender.loan_because: Someone smarter than I once said..."I believe that humanitarian aid is not enough to alleviate poverty. If individuals can learn to sustain themselves and their communities after the aid is gone, then we have a fighting chance to overcome poverty around the world."

lender.name: Jami
lender.loan_because: My son gave me the gift certificate for Christmas to be used to loan money to others. What a great gift.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: we are all extensions of each other.

lender.name: Fabian
lender.loan_because: A second chance is what the world deserves.
lender.occupational_info: Searching for wisdom to rethink the world.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I sometimes feel helpless towards world increasing poverty, and want to do a little something to help!
lender.occupational_info: I am a music supervisor. I help directors and producers to find the right music for their projects, and therefore to promote emerging artists.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I hope it helps other people achieve their goals, and hopefully a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers in London, my passions are photography, music, cycling and snowboarding.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I've seen the impact that small amounts of money can have on the lives of individuals and families, and the freedom that it can give them.

lender.name: Julin
lender.loan_because: the world needs more success stories
lender.occupational_info: I write about and teach literature written in French from and about Africa and the Caribbean.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone to have a better life
lender.occupational_info: I provide healthcare to women and deliver babies

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: ... it beats just ranting about those greedy s.o.b.s on Wall Street!!

lender.name: Meresa
lender.loan_because: I have the ability and capability to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help keep livestock healthy.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I want people to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I empower people of all abilities in the outdoors.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I support microfinance because it allows individual entrepreneurs in impoverished areas to work towards financial self-sufficiency.

lender.name: Janna
lender.loan_because: There are so many who live on the edge. I want more people to be able to raise their families without the threat of starvation or homelessness. There are so many people who just need a break. I want to give them one!
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of 5, step-mother to 7 and grandma to 7 going on 17 and we are soon to adopt 3 more! It is a job just to keep in touch with all these wonderful people, although most of them don't live at home now.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I believe in the dreams of the poorest -- because I am and all of us are simply equal --

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky in life. So I like to pass some of that luck on to someone else. Also, I currently live in Bangkok, Thailand and I see extreme poverty every day close up. Glad to be able to help someone through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an English teacher in Bangkok, Thailand and a writer. I try to help people in my every day life and pass on the good fortune I've always experienced.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.occupational_info: I help homeless young people transition into stable, independent living.

lender.name: Wesley
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others who are working hard but need assistance to help their business and family. I also believe that every person is loved by God and those of us who can, should help others when possible through a kind word, deed, or finances.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker who works in health care with persons who need assistance obtaining economic resources, counseling, and assitance in coping with a medical crisis. I have done work with dying persons for over 10 years at a local hospice.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I can afford to and because I think it's a great way to support entrepreneurs in developing countries.

lender.name: Andrew Hansen
lender.loan_because: the secret to living is giving.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to make a living with blogs and affiliate marketing on the internet.

lender.name: gaspar
lender.loan_because: i love seeding higher consciousness
lender.occupational_info:
So who in the world is Gaspar the MagiStar ?
Long before he was old enough to design architecture or work with holographic media, Gaspare Grillo had a profound desire to transform the way we experience our world. For the last couple of decades he has been immersed in the development of super-learning environments. Formal training in architecture laid the foundation for advancements into the realms of multi-media, virtual reality and floatation environments. With his focus on the science of sacred geometry, Gaspare branched out to open new realms in stargate technology, performing arts and alchemy activations. These talents have now converged into the creation of a revolutionary media matrix immersion theatre. Together with his partner KAryna SHha and an extraordinary alliance of artists, they are opening new realms in the worlds of entertainment & education that will dramatically shift the way we experience media in the coming years.
A master of ceremonies and producer of numerous events, Gaspare's achievements in the entertainment industry include opportunities to work with some of the finest leaders in the business. As president of Celestial Celebrations { iamastarseed.com }, he created the World Famous StarSeed Wishes and represents some of the most talented mystical entertainers in Canada. He continues to re-invent the art of performance and staging with tools & techniques that inspire event & meeting planners, entertain guests and deliver lasting impressions. Gaspare is a wizard of integrated media and its potential for transforming consciousness. He loves to share his expertise for filtering out distractions and getting to the core of his clients needs.
Gaspares passion for all life on earth makes him a living ambassador for thinking globally and acting locally. Through a process of dynamic systems integration, he has already made dramatic differences in the lives of those who cross paths with his ideas. Gaspares intent has always been to produce the maximum results for the most people with a minimum investment of time, money and resources.

lender.name: Cohan
lender.loan_because: soli Deo gloria

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Linda and Brigitte
lender.loan_because: Independence breeds creativity, and we would like to foster both.
lender.occupational_info: We teach English, Painting and Ceramics in Hawaii.

lender.name: Sharon and Sandes
lender.loan_because: I am able... and thankful to be able.
lender.occupational_info: Sharon owns and operates a womens' clothing store. Sandes is an camera assistant in the television and film industries.

lender.name: Don Norman
lender.loan_because: giving makes me smile. Also, I enjoy repetitive tasks and helping first one person and then another with the same dollar is sweet.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the systems that store company information.

lender.name: Edmund
lender.loan_because: I want to share in a little way some of the blessings that have come to me.
lender.occupational_info: I help high school students who are having trouble understanding chemistry in a one-on-one setting.

lender.name: KRISTI Czap
lender.loan_because: it makes sense to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel more hopeful and less powerless to know that individuals can effect positive change on a worldwide stage.

lender.name: JoE
lender.loan_because: It is a great opportunity to help those less fortunate than us. Even the smallest loan can help in a big way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer, I'm very art-centered and hope to work for a creative firm some day.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: it's empowering.
lender.occupational_info: I help plan the development and growth of communities.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: "The health of the planet is affected by the health of every individual on it."

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: I can. And I think it's the most exciting thing you can do with twenty five dollars. I love the feeling of connecting with another person so far away and knowing that the connection we have empowers us both.
lender.occupational_info: I play and teach the violin to high school children.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: God says treat my neighbor's as I would want to be treated. I loan becouse my heart knows its right! And I thank GOD for that.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days Planting new flowers, trees and making the world a little greener. And I come home with a smile every day!

lender.name: Marvin
lender.loan_because: I am not a rich person but what little I have God has shown me to share it.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work for a Telecumnications Company but I consider it my hoby, my true passion is economics and writing.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: small efforts by large numbers of people will make a difference.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: "It is easier to have faith that God will support each House of Hospitality and Farming Commune and supply our needs in the way of food and money to pay bills, than it is to keep a strong, hearty, living faith in each individual around us - to see Christ in him." -Dorothy Day

lender.name: EI MIYAMOTO
lender.loan_because: I can feel my $25 would surely contribute to someone's life which is totally unknown to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a grad student majoring sociology of development. Now I am writing a Masters thesis concerning kiva. In this summer I went to Ghana, a middle-sized country in Western Africa, to do field work concerning the research. I succeeded in interviewing some staffs in a microfinance institution and the borrowers to find the actualities of the financial project. After I returned to Japan, I also had some opportunities to talk to a couple of lenders on kiva in order to understand their feeling and intention to lend money to unknown people across the internet.

lender.name: NELSON KIVUTI
lender.loan_because: I need to expand an applied technology training school that I have just started. Im married and do computer repairs and the money isnt enough for the basic needs and the expansion of this venture.
lender.occupational_info: I intend to eradicate poverty in african continent by training people in courses that make them self sufficient eg. Making lotions from locally available materials, making of paints, making of sweets, waste management: recycling, food processing to avert the global food crisis.

lender.name: Bentley
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by God and can.
lender.occupational_info: Pellet BBQ Pits!

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: Assist others to improve their quality of life
lender.occupational_info: Furniture maker

lender.name: Mimosa
lender.loan_because: I believe that humanity should always be held far above corporate profit.

lender.name: Jean-Philippe
lender.loan_because: To appreciate a starry, we have to be fully ready. This lend is just an help to see and appreciate how the starlight.

lender.name: Yvette
lender.loan_because: banks don't seem to be doing so these days.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.occupation: Product Manager, UX and Service Design

lender.name: Walugembe
lender.loan_because: i really need a laon of 6000 dollars to begin my law firm in kampala uganda. I have all the requirements to practice law but currently am un employed. Most of this money wil be spent on rent and office funiture. Thanx in advance for your contribution coz its gona change my life and the lives of soo many other people.
lender.occupational_info: Legal practice involves soo many activities but the main ones are representing clients in courts of law and giving legal advice to clients

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Iam lucky to be able to do it and hope to spread my luck

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want people to be able to take care of their children and help their community.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people.

lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed.

lender.name: Madhavi & Jiten
lender.loan_because: We want to do our bit in trying to make a difference in this world.

lender.occupational_info: Window and Door resale business

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I prefer to give a hand up rather than a hand-out because it empowers people to be productive and honors their dignity

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses figure out how to set up their work processes to be more efficient and easier to do.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: It's about time we as a world understand that we are all one community.
lender.occupational_info: I schedule semi trucks to deliver products to customers.

lender.name: Yvette
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and I want to empower those less fortunate then myself. I would love to see them become successful despite of all the odds they might have encountered in life.

lender.name: Nanci
lender.loan_because: As a coach, I can see how believing in and supporting people makes them feel valued. This is a great motivator, empowering people to reach heights they never thought possible.
lender.occupational_info: The main focus is on personal mastery, working with people to help them understand and appreciate who they really are, how they function and what they can achieve.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: As a christian, I feel Christ calls us to help the poor.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: give people a chance, and they will make the most of it.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I am a very lucky person in a country with many opportunities. Coming from such a privileged background, I feel it's one's duty to help others achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an architecture office helping my boss with daily activities.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses run better

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I was given a monetary gift by my grandmother. I didn't really need the money, so I am lending it to people who do. This gift will be given over and over and over again.

lender.name: Juli
lender.loan_because: i love being able to help people to help themselves. And knowing that i am giving money directly to real people, not bureaucrats and middlemen, makes Kiva really exciting.
lender.occupational_info: I started my own business about 14 years ago, a boarding stable. I take care of other peoples horses on our farm.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I have the means to help, and so I do. It's part of my duty as a citizen of Earth to help those who need it, especially those who are brave enough to ask.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and study every day to become a nurse. I'm learning how to heal people who are sick so they can feel better and live a better life.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that my business is here to help other businesses in any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses find customers on the internet.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro-finance. I can't imagine a better way to invest my money!
lender.occupational_info: Conducting research on microfinance

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: It's the moral and ethical thing to do. It people to people direct. Iyt's a reputable organization

lender.name: Bret
lender.loan_because: The people on this site will use this money for much better things than I would.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lender.name: eric t.
lender.loan_because: "some people have ways and means, while others only have hopes and dreams." -Bob Marley

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: ...because I can help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Benton and Dorothy
lender.occupational_info: Recycle found trash into sculpture.

lender.name: kellina
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need money, and to have someone take a chance on me.

lender.name: Caelyn
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library. A library is a building with a lot of books, which people in my town come to and take the books out for 3 weeks for free. Once the people are done with the books they bring them back, so the next person can read them. It's my job to put the books in the proper place when they come back, I also need to make sure the library is clean, so the people that come here don't get sick.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone along the way.

lender.name: Gold
lender.loan_because: I've had friends help me out in the past with loans and financial support. I've helped out a few with similar arrangements. Kiva allows me to do the same thing with people I don't know.
lender.occupational_info: I write the code that makes websites work. I specialize in PHP and primarily develop for Drupal based sites.

lender.occupation: Registered Nurse. Special Needs Teaching assistant
lender.loan_because: I simply want to help people make a difference to their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: Currently not nursing, taking a break. Helping and assisting with the teaching and educational needs primarily of one child in a classroom setting.

lender.loan_because: We want to give people the chance of a better life and to support Kiva-what a fantastic organisation.

lender.loan_because: someone, somewhere in this world needs help.
lender.occupational_info: I handle payroll and accounts for small businesses.

lender.name: Arshan
lender.loan_because: Since I recently became employed, others need money more than I do
lender.occupational_info: Financial Services and Technology

lender.loan_because: My family worked hard and I know how much a little help can go a long way to a person's success.
lender.occupational_info: I assist companies by organizing and keeping track of information and supplies.

lender.occupational_info: I write software that delivers data to people faster.

lender.loan_because: I believe small amounts of money can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I plan and draw electrical systems for buildings like schools, hospitals, shopping malls, apartement blocks and a lot more.

lender.name: Priscilla and Joe
lender.loan_because: We would like to help other people improve themselves.

lender.name: Aafke
lender.loan_because: what is for me just a small gift, can be life changing for somebody else...

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate, and became interested in what Kiva was and how the loaning system worked.
lender.occupational_info: I go to high school, but on weekends i teach younger kids how to ski race down a mountain on snow.

lender.name: Marie-Aude
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone become self sufficient.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I believe that God has blessed me and my lending group and wants us to spread his love to those less fortunate to help them achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children that have learning disabilities to stay in their regular classroom at their grade level.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: We loan because we care.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Lillian Jrgensen
lender.loan_because: This is an exellent way to help people to help themselves...

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: Sometimes all people need in life is a little-bit of help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in my senior year at Florida International University majoring in Political Science with a minor in International Relations.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better their situation!
lender.occupational_info: I build software to save people time, and to try to make their lives easier!

lender.name: The Wagdoodles
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe that everyone deserves the right to follow their dreams, and everyone needs a little help from time to time to achieve those dreams!

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe that all people with an idea that can benefit others deserve a chance to flourish
lender.occupational_info: I am an teacher, coach and administrator for High school students that are at risk in an urban area of the USA.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: the smallest loan can help make the biggest difference.
lender.occupational_info: I learn!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I Loan because I have been blessed and want to help others less fortunate than myself.God has been good to me.

lender.name: Jocelyn
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy creating art and clothing with textiles, and meeting people around the world via the Internet.

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: I was born into a situation that has presented me with many opportunities. I want to try to help those who were born into situations with not so many opportunities.

lender.name: Johnny Bahr
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I think giving people a hand to provide for themselves is better than giving people a hand out.
lender.occupational_info:
I am an entrepreneur. I and my fiancee are in the process of starting a new business called Business Consulting Services Group. We will be a full-service small business consulting firm offering everything from payroll to HR outsourcing to web design and more.
I am also an author, and have a book in the works right now that is a travel guide of sorts for Southern California. The book should be published within the next 3 to 6 months.

lender.name: Vinnie
lender.loan_because: I don't want the world to be socialist or communist.
lender.occupational_info: I write software

lender.name: Alex Coonce
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Anne-Corinne
lender.occupational_info: I run a small diversified vegetable farm and teach about sustainable farming.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help older attorneys to represent large companies. I also try to represent individuals in need on a pro bono (free) basis.

lender.name: Cully
lender.loan_because: I know what it means to build something you believe in. I want to be able to show others that they can overcome anything to build a business, whether it aids a community, town, nation or the world. Money is a small obstacle to overcome and usually doesn't factor into the bigger picture! You can get money anywhere, Inspiration and belief has to be found from within.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: When we help others we are doing right in the eyes of God.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 4 and 5 year-old children in a Jewish preschool.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to effect positive social change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help educators to learn and teach using technology.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: it doesnt just have to be the american dream

lender.name: Bill & Anne
lender.loan_because: People need the chance to realize their dreams and to become independent. By having the chance to become prosperous people will be able to help more readily locally and nationally.
lender.occupational_info: I own two e commerce sites that sell paintball supplies to the scenario/woodsball player.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I understand the difficulties of trying to make a small business work, and because it is so easy to help someone who needs help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach businesses and people how to retain customers and polish their personal brand through excellent people skills.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate Investing

lender.name: Carson Brackney
lender.loan_because: I like great ideas and good things.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses effectively use the Internet. I'm a copywriter and a consultant.

lender.name: Abigail
lender.loan_because: Vivi en America del Sur por cinco anos y la dificultades que enfrentan las mujeres para arancar un negocio pequeno. Quiero apoyar los esfuerzos de la gente rural que trabajan mucho.
lender.occupational_info: Trato de apoyar los proyectos y negocios pequenos que apoyan la conservacion de la naturaleza y donde el dinero se queda con la comunidad.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have success and happiness in their lives and to become financially independent.
lender.occupational_info: I work with hospitals to help them acquire technology that will make their patients safer by being sure they are given the right medicines and so mistakes are avoided.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: work, personal development and self sufficiency are critical elements of a successful community. Small business people often share that view and need a hand to become self sufficent...a hand I gladly offer, albeit in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals and businesses keep as much of their earnings as possible by minimizing taxation and making informed business decisions.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: The Kiva entrepreneurs all over the world are doing work that is constructive and valuable. I am fortunate to be able to contribute.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a local government agency. I teach employees computer skills and job skills.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I know that people are struggling all across the world, and it's a beautiful thing, when you can do something, to help someone and you know, it can help change their life.
lender.occupational_info: I am in Business Marketing, I have been online for the past 2 1/2 years, and I work very hard to achieve financial Independence. I am with a business that is helping me to achieve my goals, to enable me to work from home, and someday be a millionaire. :)

lender.name: kiwanji
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help engineers and scientists continue their training and learning.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I am not rich, but I can still help. Small steps are better than no steps at all.
lender.occupational_info: I own a heating and air conditioning company. I am the only employee. I just bought a better piano which I spend alot of time playing.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I want to see people survive and succeed. It makes me feel a sense of connection across the globe and more dedicated to my own community as well.

lender.name: Lucia and Raul
lender.loan_because: Half for yourself, half for others

lender.name: Dane
lender.loan_because: I've been extremely lucky to have every opportunity in life to be successful. Most people do not get the same opportunities that I have received through sheer chance.
lender.occupational_info: Audio system problem solver.

lender.loan_because: people deserve a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Khong Wei
lender.loan_because: Improving people's live

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I've seen too many places where 25 dollars can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I play a giant video game all day, but i have to fix it when it breaks

lender.name: Becca
lender.loan_because: "The generous will prosper; Those who refresh others will themselves be refreshed." -Proverbs 11:25

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Unemployed Writer/Journalist

lender.name: house extensions
lender.occupational_info: Dcsservices.com is a small family business and have over 37 years combined experience in the building trade.Our main work is carried out within the SS and CM postcode area. Dean covers calls within Southend and surrounding areas and Ben is based in Burnham on crouch and covers the CM postcode area. Over the years we have developed a solid reputation with our clients for being personal, reliable and professional in the way we conduct ourselves, this gives you our client the confidence and trust that we can take care of you from initial consultation and discussions through to the final completion of works. This close co-operation means that you have assurance and peace of mind that you will be taken care of in a personal,reliable and professional manner when selecting our company to take care of your project however large or small.

lender.name: MN+A
lender.loan_because: We hope we can help make a contribution in areas other than our own professional work
lender.occupational_info: We are multi award winning architects, working from Hobart, Tasmania. Our current projects involve developing new ideas about tourism, recycling and sustainability generally

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I have the means to loan a bit, and others could desperately use it.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an engineer at at Biotechnology company. I briefly was an aid-worker in Central Asia several years ago.

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: sheena
lender.loan_because: it's a simple and painless way to give a bump to people who have inspiration and motivation but lack resources.

lender.name: mounia
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: it can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I look for good partners and good ideas and work together with them so we can build new businesses.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I want to help people reach their goals
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in an expensive university and I take odd jobs as I can to pay for my bills but am extremely in debt over 40,000 dollars in student loans so I am super poor but doing well enough to contribute all the same.

lender.name: robin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that need it.
lender.occupational_info: I help people feel good while they purchase products that my store sells.

lender.name: J.Gurney
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur, I understand that investor-capital helps turn a dream into a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I would like to think that my efforts help others, and myself, to achieve maximum potential and the freedom to become creative agents of broader change.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I like to give other creative women and especially working mums opportunities to succeed

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: computer technology sales development.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: It simply feels good to help people.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I received a small loan to start my business and now I want to provide loans for other entrepreneurs. In recent times, capitalism has been shown to be a destructive force to humanity. I believe it can be used as a positive force, especially in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: Science and Social Studies Teacher

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help somebody make their world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare...I treat cancer patients with radiation

lender.name: Lilly
lender.loan_because: Nothing fulfills me more than helping people and animals in need.

lender.name: lori
lender.loan_because: no matter how big or small, it makes a difference.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: we shall help each other.

lender.name: Hannah, Noah & Clara
lender.loan_because: God has been generous to us, so we want to be generous to other people.

lender.loan_because: I can
